show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #47 Moritz Espy's "Being a Bison Wrangler"
subtitle: #47 Moritz Espy's "Being a Bison Wrangler"
summary:
The outstanding Mortiz Espy joins us from the picturesque and legendary 777 Ranch, just outside of Hermosa South Dakota.
In this Episode we talk about wildfires and how we can better adapt to live fire prone environments.
We discuss regenerative Bison ranching, the differences between cattle and Bison.
I open up a can of worms and we talk about the "purity" of Bison DNA and what it's like to work with the film industry. 

https://777bison.com/

https://www.facebook.com/777bisonranch/
